trans-unit.source: How to run the HCK Test Suites in WDK 8.1
trans-unit.target: How to run the HCK Test Suites in WDK 8.1

trans-unit.source: To make testing Windows drivers easier in the WDK, starting with WDK 8.1 you can now select HCK test suites to run on the test computers.
trans-unit.target: To make testing Windows drivers easier in the WDK, starting with WDK 8.1 you can now select HCK test suites to run on the test computers.

trans-unit.source: The [HCK test suites](#HCK_test_suites) include the device fundamentals tests, and tests for graphics, imaging, wireless LAN, mobile broadband (CDMA and GSM), and WiFi Direct devices.
trans-unit.target: The [HCK test suites](#HCK_test_suites) include the device fundamentals tests, and tests for graphics, imaging, wireless LAN, mobile broadband (CDMA and GSM), and WiFi Direct devices.

trans-unit.source: These are the same tests that are used in the Windows Hardware Certification kit (Windows HCK).
trans-unit.target: These are the same tests that are used in the Windows Hardware Certification kit (Windows HCK).

trans-unit.source: See [Windows Certification Program for Hardware](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=8705) for information about the Windows HCK.
trans-unit.target: See [Windows Certification Program for Hardware](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=8705) for information about the Windows HCK.

trans-unit.source: You can run the HCK test from a Command Prompt window or from Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: You can run the HCK test from a Command Prompt window or from Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can copy these tests to a new location—which might be another computer or a USB key drive—and run the tests from that location.
trans-unit.target: In addition, you can copy these tests to a new location—which might be another computer or a USB key drive—and run the tests from that location.

trans-unit.source: Launching the tests automatically sets any local configuration needed to run the tests.
trans-unit.target: Launching the tests automatically sets any local configuration needed to run the tests.

trans-unit.source: Running the HCK Test Suites on a test computer using Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Running the HCK Test Suites on a test computer using Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Running the HCK Test Suites from a Command Prompt window
trans-unit.target: Running the HCK Test Suites from a Command Prompt window

trans-unit.source: Running the HCK Test Suites on a test computer using Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Running the HCK Test Suites on a test computer using Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: If you have not already done so, follow the instructions in [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909).
trans-unit.target: If you have not already done so, follow the instructions in [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909).

trans-unit.source: After you have configured a test computer, the name of the test computer appears in the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: After you have configured a test computer, the name of the test computer appears in the toolbar.

trans-unit.source: Be sure you have select the test computer that you have configured for device you are testing with the HCK Test Suite.
trans-unit.target: Be sure you have select the test computer that you have configured for device you are testing with the HCK Test Suite.

trans-unit.source: Prepare the test computer as needed, by installing the device and driver and any additional requirements for test topology (see the HCK test prerequisites for the device you are testing).
trans-unit.target: Prepare the test computer as needed, by installing the device and driver and any additional requirements for test topology (see the HCK test prerequisites for the device you are testing).

trans-unit.source: In place of the HCK Studio and HCK controller, you run the tests using Visual Studio and WDK 8.1.
trans-unit.target: In place of the HCK Studio and HCK controller, you run the tests using Visual Studio and WDK 8.1.

trans-unit.source: To select an HCK Test Suite to run on a test computer
trans-unit.target: To select an HCK Test Suite to run on a test computer

trans-unit.source: From the **Driver** menu, click **Test** and then select **Test Group Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Driver** menu, click **Test** and then select **Test Group Explorer**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Driver Test Group Explorer** window, click one of the [HCK Test Suites](#HCK_test_suites).
trans-unit.target: In the **Driver Test Group Explorer** window, click one of the [HCK Test Suites](#HCK_test_suites).

trans-unit.source: When you select a Test Suite, the Test Suite appears in the **Driver Test Group** window.
trans-unit.target: When you select a Test Suite, the Test Suite appears in the **Driver Test Group** window.

trans-unit.source: Be sure you have selected the test computer that you have configured for device you are testing with the HCK Test Suite.
trans-unit.target: Be sure you have selected the test computer that you have configured for device you are testing with the HCK Test Suite.

trans-unit.source: To use the HCK test suites, you must also follow the configuration requirements for the device you are testing.
trans-unit.target: To use the HCK test suites, you must also follow the configuration requirements for the device you are testing.

trans-unit.source: You can use the check boxes to select the tests that match the architecture of the intended test computer (x86, x64, ARM).
trans-unit.target: You can use the check boxes to select the tests that match the architecture of the intended test computer (x86, x64, ARM).

trans-unit.source: From the **Driver** menu, click **Test > Run test**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Driver** menu, click **Test > Run test**.

trans-unit.source: By default, the Run test command runs all of the tests in the currently selected test group.
trans-unit.target: By default, the Run test command runs all of the tests in the currently selected test group.

trans-unit.source: You can also copy one of the provided HCK Test Suites and export it, along with the necessary test support files so that you can run the test suite from a Command Prompt window.
trans-unit.target: You can also copy one of the provided HCK Test Suites and export it, along with the necessary test support files so that you can run the test suite from a Command Prompt window.

trans-unit.source: To export a Test Suite
trans-unit.target: To export a Test Suite

trans-unit.source: In the **Test Group Explorer**, right-click the HCK Test Suite you want to copy and click **Export Test Suite...** from the short-cut menu.
trans-unit.target: In the **Test Group Explorer**, right-click the HCK Test Suite you want to copy and click **Export Test Suite...** from the short-cut menu.

trans-unit.source: (The command runs the **CopyMe.cmd** script).
trans-unit.target: (The command runs the **CopyMe.cmd** script).

trans-unit.source: Select a destination folder for the test suite.
trans-unit.target: Select a destination folder for the test suite.

trans-unit.source: You can export the test suite to a network share or to a USB flash drive.
trans-unit.target: You can export the test suite to a network share or to a USB flash drive.

trans-unit.source: To run the HCK Test Suite, open a Command Prompt window on the test computer with elevated permissions.
trans-unit.target: To run the HCK Test Suite, open a Command Prompt window on the test computer with elevated permissions.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the destination directory and run the **RunMe.cmd** script.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the destination directory and run the **RunMe.cmd** script.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [To run the HCK Test Suite from a Command Prompt window](#RunMe).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [To run the HCK Test Suite from a Command Prompt window](#RunMe).

trans-unit.source: Running the HCK Test Suites from a Command Prompt window
trans-unit.target: Running the HCK Test Suites from a Command Prompt window

trans-unit.source: Copy the HCK Test Suite
trans-unit.target: Copy the HCK Test Suite

trans-unit.source: Open a Visual Studio Command Prompt window.
trans-unit.target: Open a Visual Studio Command Prompt window.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the %WindowsSdkDir%\\Testing\\Tests\\HCK Tests\\Basic directory.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the %WindowsSdkDir%\\Testing\\Tests\\HCK Tests\\Basic directory.

trans-unit.source: For example, C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Kits\\8.1\\Testing\\Tests\\HCK Tests\\Basic
trans-unit.target: For example, C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Windows Kits\\8.1\\Testing\\Tests\\HCK Tests\\Basic

trans-unit.source: Run the **CopyMe.cmd** script and specify the name of test suite and destination directory.
trans-unit.target: Run the **CopyMe.cmd** script and specify the name of test suite and destination directory.

trans-unit.source: The script has the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: The script has the following syntax:

trans-unit.source: The *testSuite* is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: The *testSuite* is one of the following:

trans-unit.source: Device.Device Fundamentals
trans-unit.target: Device.Device Fundamentals

trans-unit.source: Device.Graphics
trans-unit.target: Device.Graphics

trans-unit.source: Device.Imaging
trans-unit.target: Device.Imaging

trans-unit.source: Device.Network.MobileBroadband.CDMA
trans-unit.target: Device.Network.MobileBroadband.CDMA

trans-unit.source: Device.Network.MobileBroadband.GSM
trans-unit.target: Device.Network.MobileBroadband.GSM

trans-unit.source: Device.Network.WLAN
trans-unit.target: Device.Network.WLAN

trans-unit.source: The *destinationPath* can be any valid path, including UNC paths.
trans-unit.target: The *destinationPath* can be any valid path, including UNC paths.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can copy an HCK Test Suite to a USB flash drive, or to a share on a server.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can copy an HCK Test Suite to a USB flash drive, or to a share on a server.

trans-unit.source: **Note** If the test computer is running Windows 7, you need to download and install the [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=317996) before you can run the HCK Test Suite.
trans-unit.target: **Note** If the test computer is running Windows 7, you need to download and install the [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=317996) before you can run the HCK Test Suite.

trans-unit.source: To run the HCK Test Suite from a Command Prompt window
trans-unit.target: To run the HCK Test Suite from a Command Prompt window

trans-unit.source: On the test computer that you have configured for testing, open a Command Prompt window with elevated privileges (**Run as administrator**) and navigate to the directory where you copied the HCK Test Suite.
trans-unit.target: On the test computer that you have configured for testing, open a Command Prompt window with elevated privileges (**Run as administrator**) and navigate to the directory where you copied the HCK Test Suite.

trans-unit.source: Run the **RunMe.cmd** script and specify the path and name of the INF file.
trans-unit.target: Run the **RunMe.cmd** script and specify the path and name of the INF file.

trans-unit.source: The script has the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: The script has the following syntax:

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: **Note** The Device.Graphics test suite does not make use of an INF file, however, the **RunMe.cmd** script requires an INF file.
trans-unit.target: **Note** The Device.Graphics test suite does not make use of an INF file, however, the **RunMe.cmd** script requires an INF file.

trans-unit.source: You can provide the name of substitute INF file if necessary.
trans-unit.target: You can provide the name of substitute INF file if necessary.

trans-unit.source: HCT Test Suites
trans-unit.target: HCT Test Suites

trans-unit.source: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Device Fundamentals Test Suite
trans-unit.target: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Device Fundamentals Test Suite

trans-unit.source: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Graphics Test Suite
trans-unit.target: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Graphics Test Suite

trans-unit.source: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Imaging Test Suite
trans-unit.target: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Imaging Test Suite

trans-unit.source: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Network.MobileBroadband.CDMA Test Suite
trans-unit.target: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Network.MobileBroadband.CDMA Test Suite

trans-unit.target: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Network.MobileBroadband.GSM Test Suite

trans-unit.source: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Network.WLAN Test Suite
trans-unit.target: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Network.WLAN Test Suite

trans-unit.source: For information about specifying test parameters, see [Device Fundamentals Test Parameters](how_to_select_and_configure_the_device_fundamental_tests.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about specifying test parameters, see [Device Fundamentals Test Parameters](how_to_select_and_configure_the_device_fundamental_tests.md).

trans-unit.source: If the device under test under test or one of its child devices is a WiFi adapter or a network device, you might need to set the *Wpa2PskAesSsid*, *Wpa2PskPassword*, or *WDTFREMOTESYSTEM* parameters.
trans-unit.target: If the device under test under test or one of its child devices is a WiFi adapter or a network device, you might need to set the *Wpa2PskAesSsid*, *Wpa2PskPassword*, or *WDTFREMOTESYSTEM* parameters.

trans-unit.source: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Device Fundamentals Test Suite
trans-unit.target: HCK Tests.Basic.Device.Device Fundamentals Test Suite

trans-unit.source: Use this test suite for general reliability testing of all device types.
trans-unit.target: Use this test suite for general reliability testing of all device types.

trans-unit.source: You must follow the hardware, software, and test requirements for the HCK tests as described in the [Device.Fundamentals Reliability Testing Prerequisites](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=309665).
trans-unit.target: You must follow the hardware, software, and test requirements for the HCK tests as described in the [Device.Fundamentals Reliability Testing Prerequisites](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=309665).

trans-unit.source: In place of the HCK Studio and HCK controller, you run the basic tests using Visual Studio and WDK 8.1.
trans-unit.target: In place of the HCK Studio and HCK controller, you run the basic tests using Visual Studio and WDK 8.1.
